    level="1"

    pfs="Standard"
>
[Root Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=6501) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 233 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

</column>

---

Your talismans ward against foul magic. During your daily preparations, you can assemble a small pouch with bits of herbs, hair, sacred oils, and other ritual ingredients, which you give to one ally; the ally cannot be yourself. The first time that day the ally attempts a saving throw against a spell or [haunt](/Traits.aspx?ID=622), they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll. This bonus increases to +2 if you're an expert in Occultism or +3 if you're legendary.
